prompt: Hi my name is RAMDHAN KUMAR and I want to create a portfolio for me. I'm a full stack web developer, my tech stack is MERN and I've made a digital circuit simulator project
refinedPrompt: Create a professional portfolio website for Ramdhan Kumar, a full stack web developer specializing in the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) stack. Showcase his skills, experience, and notable projects, including a detailed case study of his digital circuit simulator. Design an engaging and responsive layout that highlights his expertise and attracts potential clients or employers.
